articles.title: Japan hatches plan to launch wooden satellites in bizarre world first - Daily Express
articles.description: JAPAN is due to launch satellites made out of wood in just a few years in what is due to be a world first.

articles.title: Final full 'cold moon' reaches its peak tonight as Quadrantids meteor shower begins - Mirror Online
articles.description: The final full 'cold moon' of the year is due to reach its peak in the early hours of tomorrow morning while the Quadrantids meteor shower is due to begin raining down over the coming days
articles.content:

articles.title: Yellowstone: USGS sends ‘devastating’ warning after running volcano eruption probe - Daily Express
articles.description: YELLOWSTONE volcano scientist Dr Mike Poland has warned of the 'devastating' capacity of the volcano after his team performed simulations of ashfall across the US in the event of a supereruption.
